title: ISic000788. Epitaph for Cartilia Irene
body:
1D(is) ❦ M(anibus) ❦
2Cartilia ❦ Ire-
3ne ❦ vix(it) ❦ ann(is) ❦
4XXXVIII ❦ Cl(audius) ❦ The-
5seus ❦ uxori ❦
6sanctissimae

1D❦M❦
2CARTILIA❦IRE
3NE❦VIX❦ANN❦
4XXXVIII❦CL❦THE
5SEUS❦UXORI❦
6SANCTISSIMAE

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Bitto 2001

English translation

Vittorio Bottini

To the Shades of the Underworld. Cartilia Irene lived 38 years. Claudius Theseus to (his) most pure wife

Italian translation

Vittorio Bottini

Alle ombre dell'aldilà. Cartilia Irene visse 38 anni. Claudio Teseo per la (sua) purissima moglie

commentary

Three other texts from the same necropolis were also set up by Claudius Thesis, two in Greek (ISic003529, ISic003530) and a second in Latin (ISic000787).
